p: Based on the Markov cohort simulation, the treatment results for each HP over the next 20 years can be predicted with a total cost of €206,184 for DAA patients with therapy experience ( Supplementary Figures S1 and S2). By comparison, the costs over 20 years for triple therapy come to €171,017. Therefore, total costs within this period are €35,167 higher for patients treated with DAAs ( Supplementary Figures S3 and S4).
